subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Edgar Renteria, the World Series most valuable player, has agreed to a one-year deal with the Cincinnati Reds, who were looking for a veteran shortstop to replace Orlando Cabrera.
snippet: Edgar Renteria, the World Series most valuable player, has agreed to a one-year deal with the Cincinnati Reds, who were looking for a veteran shortstop to replace Orlando Cabrera.
